Sets dedent option via option.
---
{"dedent":true}
---
<vue-component-doc>
    testcase
        indent
</vue-component-doc>
---
<vue-component-doc-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>testcase
    indent</template>
<template v-slot:result>testcase
    indent</template>
</vue-component-doc-test>
